changes: Added ability to modify action selections made with shift-click
Fixed a bug where Between the Lines did not re-enable Ley Lines if toggled
Page layout updates
Lots of underlying implementation updates but shouldn't affect behavior
A few Chinese localization updates
Style update for remaining stacks
Fix thunder 3 lasting for 30s in thunder stats table
Added number of remaining stacks of Triplecast on hotbar
Greatly reduced time needed to load a line
Lines preset: when using a line created at a different level, adapt to current level by auto-converting equivalent skills if possible; throw an error otherwise
Add image export feature
Level sync for levels 70, 80, 90 - Thank you Turtle!!
Bug fix: when the current slot contains resource override(s), adding a new slot crashes the tool (ty shanzhe and Turtle)
Change Starry Muse party buff duration to 20.5s
Remove "extended buff duration" config option and now triple always lasts 15.7s and firestarter lasts 30.5s
Implement FPS tax and deprecate caster tax config option
Update my contact email
Tincture application delay -> 0.64s
Add back ultimates markers presets
Allow party buffs to last shorter than max duration
Add link to Pictomancer in the Shell
Raise warning when Amplifier is used at max polyglot stacks
Revise PPS description and description for polyglot resource override condition
Added M3S markers by shanzhe
Akairyu - Fix a bug with Polyglot timer handling when Enochian resumes after an Umbral Soul pause
Added M2S markers and log CSV parsing script by shanzhe
Added M4S markers by shanzhe and removed presets from Endwalker.
patch 7.05 job changes
bugfix: paradox sometimes not showing as "available" when looking at historical game states
bugfix: retrace not available when LL buff exists but is disabled
make LL enable itself when using LL
show thunder tick number when hovering over damage mark
New timeline marker type: party buffs! Huge thanks to Turtle for making this feature, and Galahad for their help with translation and proofreading.
Updated High Thunder and Flare Star application delays, thanks to shanzhe.
Updated cast time formula: cast times now have 3 digits of precision. See About this tool/Implementation notes for details.
Updated most time-related UI to show 3 decimal places.
Update SPS and dot potency formulae to match Dawntrail (by Turtle)
Adjust potion animation lock to normal instead of long 1.14s
Let ice spells grant MP when on hit (as opposed to on snapshot). This is closer to what I observed in screen recordings.
Umbral Soul has ~0.633s delay for MP gain, not instant.
Manafont skill application delay is significantly shortened
Thunderhead duration seems to be exact so "extended buff times" shouldn't change that
Also put the above notes into "About this tool/Implementation notes" section
A bit code cleanup
preliminary 7.0 job changes
localStorage refactor & migration (there should be a notice that links to the EW version when there's obsolete data)
update PSA and "About this tool"
6/26 PSA before Dawntrail & 6/27 quick update
Fixed a tiny bug: when switching language, source of damage on the timeline now updates just like the rest of UI
Some housekeeping stuff: a dependency package update, repository README.md
Let there be an empty timeline slot if none is loaded from localStorage. This should fix the issue that causes new user (browser) to get stuck when trying to use skills but there's no timeline.
Support up to 4 timeline slots. Have just 1 active at a time and let the other one(s) be references. This is a medium-large update so lmk if I accidentally broke something.
QoL update: let the timeline window be large enough to show all slots and all markers
fix paradox skill icon doesn't show up when displaying historical state
refactored timeline renderer a bit
let the old "wait till next mp or lucid tick" button also account for mp gain from manafont

let PPS calculation exclude untargetable times

stats: thunder DoT coverage time & num ticks

thunder DoT tick time offset is now fixed relative to mp ticks; see config, under lucid tick offset. This MAY break old fights with proc mode RNG. If one of your old files broke, you might be able to restore it by text editing the record and setting proc mode to Always. Or send it to me and I might be able to help.
